channel.title: WikiFolders AppCast
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.2 (Beta Release)
item.description:
Version 1.2 (Beta Release)

  • Added minimum system version requirement to application file
  • Images in the WikiFolder can be referenced inline using <IMG/> tags (bug #2119594)
  • WikiFolder HTML rendering computes the folder window size correctly now (bug #2116936)
